title: MessageGroup
description: Configuration object for groups of Messaging System messages

id.description: A unique identifier for the message that should not conflict with any other previous message.

enabled.description: Enables or disables all messages associated with this group.

userPreferences.description: Collection of preferences that control if the group is enabled.

frequency.description: An object containing frequency cap information for a message.

lifetime.description: The maximum lifetime impressions for a message.

custom.description: An array of custom frequency cap definitions.

items.description: A frequency cap definition containing time and max impression information

oneOf.description: Period of time in milliseconds (e.g. 86400000 for one day)

cap.description: The maximum impressions for the message within the defined period.
